basics.name: Diego Souto Catoira
basics.label: Program Manager. Head of Technology Strategy & Partnerships at Altia
basics.summary: Experienced Program Manager at Altia with a proven track record in diverse projects including consulting, software development, system implementation, and support-maintenance. Currently, I focus on advising, pre-sales, and developing value propositions. I actively contribute to internal company improvement processes, spanning quality, technology, and strategy. I also collaborate transversally within Altia Group's Global Risks Unit and serve as Head of Technology Strategy and Partnerships within Altia's Technology Directorate. My past transversal roles include corporate tools, training management, and process improvement. I am committed to continuous learning and strive to instill values of professionalism, responsibility, and dedication to excellence in my teams.
